nodes.text: Hal'Sted was a male Siniteen criminal on the planet of Rattatak. At an unknown time before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, he traveled to Dathomir, where he met the Nightsister mother Talzin, who chose to hand a newborn Dathomirian Asajj over to him in order to protect her clan. After leaving the planet, he returned to Rattatak to raise Asajj as a slave. Hal'Sted was later killed by Weequay pirates.
